briefdescription.para: ARC baseline instruction set version number.
ARC CPU Clock Frequency in Hz unit.
Reduced register option, if enabled, ARC_FEATURE_RF16 will be defined.

detaileddescription.para: Unaligned access option, if enabled, ARC_FEATURE_UNALIGNED will be defined Code density option, if enabled, ARC_FEATURE_CODE_DENSITY will be defined The number of register file banks

briefdescription.para: The number of registers replicated per register bank.

detaileddescription.para: Interrupt unit presence FIRQ_OPTION configuration option, 1 for enabled, 0 for disabled

The number of external interrupts The interrupt priority levels Timer0 present or not Timer1 present or not Secure Timer0 present or not Secure Timer1 present or not 64bit RTC present or not ICCM Presence, base address and size ICCM0 Presence, base address and size ICCM1 Presence, base address and size DCCM Presence, base address and size Peripheral memory region(DMP) base address, if dmp configured, this macro will be defined as base address MPU options Secure BCR SEC_BUILD BCR Data Cache options Instruction Cache options ARC uDMA options ARC mpy option

memberdef.name: ARC_FEATURE_FPU_DSP_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* whether to put FPU and DSP regs into the context */

briefdescription.para: header file for arc feature configuration
